p:
The culprit of the recent pandemic in 2020, termed by the WHO as coronavirus disease‐2019 (COVID‐19), is yet another novel coronavirus; now named SARS‐CoV‐2. The ultimate origin of SARS‐CoV‐2 is believed to be bats with a possible unknown intermediate host (possibly pangolins) transmitting the virus to humans.
28 ,
